keyword: calories in panda express teriyaki chicken
title: Calories in Panda Express Teriyaki Chicken
meta_description: Discover calories in panda express teriyaki chicken per serving, including macros like protein and fat, plus tweaks and FAQs for better meal choices.
h1: Calories in Panda Express Teriyaki Chicken
assumptions: Standard single serving (5.7 oz / 162 g) of grilled teriyaki chicken with sauce, as per Panda Express menu.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, preparation, and customizations. Check the official Panda Express app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One serving provides 300 kcal, 34 g protein, and 13 g fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant info.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of Panda Express teriyaki chicken?
What's the protein content in Panda Express teriyaki chicken?
faqs.a: 34 g protein per serving, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Does Panda Express teriyaki chicken have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 760 mg sodium per serving, mostly from the sauce.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Panda Express teriyaki chicken?
faqs.a: 14 g carbs per serving, primarily from the sugary teriyaki sauce.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in Panda Express teriyaki chicken?
faqs.a: It's grilled, keeping calories lower than fried versions; sauce adds most of the sugars and sodium.
